root.name: EvaIrbImporter
root.description: Open VarioCAM HD infrared camera image with "open" command in Icy. The extension is .irb and currently only support 1024*768.
root.author: oeway - Wei Ouyang
root.changelog:
- Version 1.3.1.0 Date 2014-07-31 11:08:54
* fix jar file error
- Version 1.3.0.1 Date 2014-07-31 10:52:54
* change JDK version to 1.6 to be capatible with lower version

* Change class name * Fix the signed short type conversion problem
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2014-07-08 14:09:16
* fixed sequence title bug

* fixed the bug of drag and drop

* read sequence as frames * add file type recognition by file header
